site_name: Phoenix High School The CurveLondonW12 0RQ
application_type_full: Tree works: Trees in conservation areas/subject to TPOs
description: T3: Lombardy Poplar - Fell to ground level. Trunk (main stem) can be left in situ. Branches and cordwood to be chipped under and adjacent to T4 - T9.T4, T5, T6, T7, T8, T18, T22, T23: Lombardy Poplars - Pollard to previous pointsT20: Lombardy Poplar - Pollard to previous points, remove decaying stem. T21: Lombardy Poplar - Pollard to 4.5mT24: Willow - Pollard to previous pointsT31: Norway Maple - Remove deadwood. (chip and cart from site)T9, T48, T50, T51, T62: Lombardy Poplars - Fell to ground levelT52: Lombardy Poplar - Remove hanging branch.T56: Lombardy Poplar - Remove fallen trunk from the fence; T63: Lombardy Poplar - Remove fallen trunk from the fence.T65: Oak - major stem failure due to compression fork. Pollard at approx. 3m just below wound and just above fence height.
borough: London Borough of Hammersmith and Fulham
